snippet.title: Disney Pixar Cars Arcade
snippet.description:
The game features 6 tracks and 36 cars from both movies,unique to this gameis backwards driving when the car flip in front of the player and chatter,there is also jump button to use for shortcuts or dodge enemies.
Like any Raw Thrills racing game, cars have nitro for boost,fully charged nitro give you shield to bump enemies out the track,as always to charge it you need to do drifting and tricks,including slipstreaming and backward driving.
You can also usa a max charge nitro right at start of the race by pushing the accel pedal a few times and get a super fast start.

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/InsertCoinArcadeOfficial/
Email: insertcoinarcade@outlook.it
Twitter: https://twitter.com/InsertCoinArcad
